name: Point Alpha
description:
A full-scale invasion has begun, and your city is the first target.
You quickly realize that there is no walking away from the massive air force heading your way and that your city is doomed.

As you begin to fire at the enemy, you wonder how long you can hold them off.

And if you can give your people a chance to rally their forces in the war to come.

Tap the screen to fire a missile to the location and destroy your enemies.
